      • putSharedPrefs

        public static void putSharedPrefs(Context context,
                  java.lang.String prefName,
                  int mode,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pairs)
        Purpose - Put shared preferences through the Shared Preferences API. Use this if you need multiple shared preference files identified by name.
        Parameters:
        context - - Current context
        prefName - - Desired preferences file name
        mode - - Mode to open shared preferences
        pairs - - map to put in shared preferences

      • putPrefs

        public static void putPrefs(Activity context,
            int mode,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pairs)
        Purpose - Put preferences through the Shared Preferences API. Use this from an activity if you need to use only one shared preference file for the activity
        Parameters:
        context - - Activity context
        mode - - Mode to open shared preferences
        pairs - - map to put in shared preferences
